original_text: For he will finish the work, and cut it short in righteousness: because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth.
korean_text: 주께서 땅 위에서 그 말씀을 이루고 속히 시행하시리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: For he will finish the work
and cut it short in righteousness
because a short work will the Lord make
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 짧은 일을 행하실 것이기 때문이라
